description: Followup Los Angeles concert to Carreras Domingo Pavarotti in Concert (1990). Several songs are sung in English, and celebrity attendees include the (then former) 41st US President and the (then future) 38th governor of the state ...
name: The 3 Tenors in Concert 1994

original_info.id: The Three Tenors in Concert: Dodger Stadium_1994
original_info.name: The Three Tenors in Concert: Dodger Stadium

review.name: Encore, Encore, Encore
review.reviewBody: On July 16, 1994, the moon shines down on Los Angeles to reveal an astounding sight: Dodger Stadium is transformed from ballpark to concert hall, where some of the most gifted artists of our time gather to enthrall an audience. The conjunction of these stellar performers in concert creates a kind of spontaneous combustion, a brilliant explosion radiating an excitement rarely seen in the world of classical music. And they come together not only as colleagues, but also as friends - and friendly competitors.
